cause.description:
HIV and Aids are very deadly diseases and more needs to be done in the attempt to decrease the amount of infections. This facebook cause is a very convenient method for young people to get together and not only have a dialogue about Aids, but also anyone who would like to assist this cause can do so. You can join the cause, donate money, or just invite your friends to join – the point is to achieve awareness of this deadly virus.
Goals of this cause:
1) Become comfortable with having dialogue concerning HIV/AIDS 2) Learning Safe Sex Practices 3) Steps to Prevent STI's 4) What to do if you have been exposed to HIV/AIDS 5) How to cope with being infected 6) End the isolation of Aids Patients 7) Global Outreach
1. Funds need to be raised to find a cure for Aids
2. HIV/Aids education should not be a taboo topic.
3. More money needs to be raised to curtail the costs of HIV/AIDS healthcare.
cause.mission: To provide as much information on this fatal disease.
cause.name: Aids 411 and Awareness
